plot outline: Venkata Lakshmi, the daughter of Veera Raju, owner of a small theatre in a town is stuck between two guys who love her, Prabhu, a carefree guy from her village and Krish, son of Veera Raju's abandoned sister. When she wants to go on a trip into nature, both Prabhu and Krish get ready for it, both with their own ulterior motives. Darker secrets unleash sooner.
title: O Pitta Katha
plot: Two men fall deeply in love with the same woman but when she suddenly gets kidnapped they get involved in the case to rescue her.

Venkata Lakshmi, the daughter of Veera Raju, owner of a small theatre in a town is stuck between two guys who love her, Prabhu, a carefree guy from her village and Krish, son of Veera Raju's abandoned sister. When she wants to go on a trip into nature, both Prabhu and Krish get ready for it, both with their own ulterior motives. Darker secrets unleash sooner.
